title: Looking for the Font
author: ShortestFlame96

comments.content:
Arno comes very close, but the leg of the R terminates differently in your sample:  
 [http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/adobe/arno/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317181110/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/adobe/arno/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/adobe/arno/")

Okay, I just noticed that there are two styles of Ts here--one with only downward-facing serifs at 90 degrees, and the other with angled serifs at about 80 degrees.

ORTRIGH appears to be Apollo small caps:  
 [http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/mti/apollo/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317181110/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/mti/apollo/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/mti/apollo/")

The rest appears to be Arno
Thanks for your help, they both matched!
